amendment.description: To provide assistance for the Ibn Khaldun Center for Development in Egypt.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1991 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1991 proposed by Senator McConnell. (consideration: CR S13346; text: CR S13346) To provide assistance for the Ibn Khaldun Center for Development in Egypt.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1991 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1991 proposed by Senator McConnell.
